channel.title: Yell counter..or whatever it would be called
channel.description: What i need is like when you talk...it counts it so say you talk 5 times in 10 seconds it does something...i'll make what it does :P i cant really explain unless i tell you what im going to do...and IF it works ill give a tutorial....i think it will work though

item.title: Yell counter..or whatever it would be called
item.dc:creator: @mclovinscape mclovinscape
item.description:
@mclovinscape wrote:

317 not a yell timer… ok ill tell you my idea… if someone says something 20 times in 10 secs it disconnects them(syipkpker) if they do it again it mutes them bye there ip or ipbans them

Read full topic

item.title: Yell counter..or whatever it would be called
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

Is this for your 503+? Or a regular 317, 377, etc?
Post back and I’ll get you it.

[quote=“ziplock, post:3, topic:236957”][quote author=mclovinscape link=topic=312813.msg2491827#msg2491827 date=1224181590]
What i need is like when you talk…it counts it so say you talk 5 times in 10 seconds it does something…i’ll make what it does i cant really explain unless i tell you what im going to do…and IF it works ill give a tutorial…i think it will work though
[/quote]

I don’t see a question mark anywhere in their. whats your question?[/quote]
And he needs a yell timer. Something that makes you be able to send EX: 5 yells every minute.

Read full topic
